name: Toh Jin Ming (Jaden)
label: Software/Hardware Developer
summary: Passionate about technology and research, with a strong desire to design products that benefit millions. A results-oriented professional with extensive experience in technologies, seeking to leverage acquired knowledge and expertise to drive innovation and impact.

work_experience.summary: Automation fibre network provisioning system for ViewQwest's customers and client and Smart Home IoT product development.
highlights: Created and maintained automation frontend and back-end API services using Python and Django. With this automation, it reduce the process time by 80%
Tested and Mainteined Smart Home IoT product. Developed using Z-wave, Java, MQTT, GCP and iOS/Android Apps. This product is used by ViewQwest's customers to control their home devices.
Led a team of 3–4 developers on these projects and product.

work_experience.summary: Attachment and training programme organized by WSG and RACE academy to train me in robotics and automation. Trainee will undergo 3 months training and 3months OJT on robotics or Automation Company.
highlights: Learnt python and C programming language, and how to use it to control hardware devices.
Acquired knowledge on 3D CAD (Computer-Aided Design) software and certified in Solidworks Associate (CSWA).
Planned, development and design ROS (Robot Operating Sytem) curriculum for RACE Academy for the furture Ant Trainee.
Worked on AMR project with changi airport group that Hitch buddy is a robot that can help to carry dustbin that are full to the disposal area.

work_experience.summary: Supported build-up, testing, deployment, and troubleshooting of Automated Guided Vehicles (AGVs) and Autonomous Mobile Robots (AMRs) for various customers.
highlights: Learnt ROS (Robot Operating System) and how to use it.
Assisted in setup on AMR magnetic dockering, charging station and automation sliding door opening.
Assisted in deployment of AMR and lidar mapping at customer site.
Created python scripts to easier depolyament and testing AMR and AGV.

work_experience.summary: supported the creation of prototypes for five research projects. Gained experience with hardware and software integration, and developed skills in project management and team collaboration.
highlights: Worked on those hardware device and sensor Arduino, NodeMCU, ESP32, RaspberryPi and IC chip amplifier, ADC, load-cell, zigbee and rfid.
Worked on those software programming language Arduino C/C++, Python MySQL, PHP, JavaScrpit and AWS/GCP.
Self-learned and applied skills like 3D drawing, 3D printing, and PCB design, PCB soldering.
Smart Inventory Management system
Feet and Posture measurement device for kids
Water level tracking system
Indoor tracking devices for the elderly home
Weight monitoring system for the bedridden patient.

work_experience.summary: Monitoring and troubleshoot hotel network, Servers, PCs and printers.
highlights: Monitor network for abnormal usage via cisco web UI.
Weekly Network device and Servers physical check.
Troubleshooting guest Wi-Fi network, hotel staffs PC and network/server downtime issue.

work_experience.summary: Serviced Apache AH64D Helicopter and Managing SAP.
highlights: Servicing, marshalling and weapon loading on Aircraft.
Logging and check SAP data is correct for Aircraft
Demand spare Aircraft part via SAP System
When to Oversea detachment for exercise training at Australia.

projects.title: DIY Autonomous Robot Toy Car
projects.summary: A DIY project to build an autonomous robot toy car using Arduino, Raspberry Pi, and various sensors like lidar, ultrasonic, motor driver, accelerometer, and gyroscope. The project aims to create a toy car that can navigate autonomously using sensors and ROS (Robot Operating System).
highlights: Custom Motor Driver with PID control for precise speed and direction control.
Lidar-based obstacle detection and avoidance using ROS.
Plan to add-on features like camera for object detection and recognition.
Plan improvement manoeuvrability with additional sensors like accelermetr and gyroscope.

images.caption: Toy Car with PID Motor Driver

projects.title: Hitch Buddy
projects.summary: A RACE academy project with Changi Airport Group to develop an autonomous mobile robot (AMR) that can assist in carrying full dustbins to the disposal area. The project involves using ROS (Robot Operating System) for navigation and control, and it aims to improve efficiency in waste management at the airport.
highlights: Confiured and tested AMR detect the QR code on the floor for docking and picking up the dustbin.
Design customized hatch for the AMR to carry the dustbin.
Add-on camera to AMR to precisely dock properly with the dustbin.

images.caption: Hitch Buddy AMR and Team members

projects.title: Vesta Shield (Smart Home Security Product)
projects.summary: Centralized IoT hub using Z-Wave & Wi-Fi; integrated smart sensors, plugs, and Zigbee lighting; hosted on GCP with Android/iOS app development.
highlights: Developed a centralized IoT hub using Z-Wave and Wi-Fi protocols.
Integrated various smart sensors, plugs, and Zigbee lighting for home automation.
Hosted the system on Google Cloud Platform (GCP) for scalability and reliability.
Developed Android and iOS applications for user control and monitoring.

images.caption: Vesta Shield Smart Home Security Product

projects.title: Weight Monitoring System for Bedridden Patients
projects.summary: Designed a low-cost, continuous weight monitoring solution using load-cell sensors; data transmitted to a mobile app for real-time analysis.
highlights: Developed a low-cost weight monitoring system using load-cell sensors.
Implemented continuous weight tracking for bedridden patients.
Data transmitted to a mobile application for real-time analysis and alerts.

projects.title: Indoor Tracking Device for Elderly Homes
projects.summary: Developed Zigbee-based indoor location tracking system for elderly residents in healthcare facilities.
highlights: Engineered a Zigbee-based indoor location tracking system.
Designed for elderly residents in healthcare facilities to ensure safety and monitoring.
Implemented real-time tracking and alert system for caregivers.

projects.title: Water Level Tracking System
projects.summary: Built RFID-based water level monitoring with real-time web-based UI for data visualization.
highlights: Developed a water level tracking system using RFID technology.
Implemented real-time monitoring with a web-based user interface for data visualization.
Enabled alerts for low or high water levels to ensure timely action.

projects.title: Feet & Posture Measurement Device
projects.summary: Created device to measure weight distribution and posture; integrated with server/VM for analysis and historical tracking.
highlights: Designed a device to measure weight distribution and posture.
Integrated with a server/VM for data analysis and historical tracking.
Provided insights into posture correction and foot health.

projects.title: Smart Inventory Management System
projects.summary: Engineered load-cell-based pick-to-light inventory tracking with automated restocking alerts via API integration.
highlights: Developed a smart inventory management system using load-cell sensors.
Implemented pick-to-light technology for efficient inventory tracking.
Automated restocking alerts via API integration to streamline operations.
